message.content:
Implement the following plan:

# Plano: Adaptar telas do FitToday no Pencil MCP

## Context

O usuário quer criar novas versões das telas de **Home**, **AI Assistant**, **Workout Tab**, **Workout Detail** e **Profile** no arquivo `.pen` existente (`/Users/viniciuscarvalho/Documents/untitled.pen`), baseando-se em screenshots de referência que mostram um design clean, moderno e com conteúdo fitness visual (imagens de exercícios, calorie tracker, weekly calendar).

O arquivo `.pen` já possui 19 componentes reutilizáveis e ~18 telas. As novas telas serão criadas como **novos frames** ao lado das existentes, mantendo o design system atual (cores, tipografia, componentes).

---

## Diferenças-chave entre o design atual e as referências

| Elemento | Design Atual | Referência |
|----------|-------------|------------|
| Home header | Greeting simples + AI Generator card | Avatar + greeting + streak badge + weekly calendar |
| Nutrition | Não existe | Calorie ring + fuel score + macros |
| Exercise list | Workout cards sem imagens | Exercise rows com thumbnails circulares |
| Workout tab | Lista de treinos salvos | Ongoing workout timer + today's workout list |
| AI Assistant | Chat com personal trainer | FitPal orb + greeting + quick action buttons |
| Profile | Não existe no .pen | Premium badge + stats + Whoop sync + sections |
| Workout Detail | Lista simples de exercícios | Hero image + equipment chips + exercise list com imagens |

---

## Novos componentes reutilizáveis a criar

Antes de montar as telas, criar estes building blocks no frame `Components` (`8wJnL`):

1. **Weekly Calendar Strip** - Row com dias da semana (Sun-Sat), círculos, dia ativo destacado
2. **Exercise Row with Image** - Row com thumbnail circular (imagem), nome, detalhes, seta/checkbox
3. **Calorie Ring** - Ellipse com progresso circular + texto central
4. **Macro Badge** - Valor + label (ex: "100g Protein Left")
5. **Stat Card** - Ícone + valor + label (para profile stats)
6. **Section Row** - Row com título + seta (para seções do profile)
7. **Quick Action Chip** - Botão com ícone + texto (para AI Assistant actions)

---

## Telas a criar (5 novos top-level frames)

### Tela 1: Home Screen (390x844)
Posição: encontrar espaço livre via `find_empty_space_on_canvas`

**Estrutura:**
```
Home Screen (V2)
├── Status Bar area (padding top)
├── Header
│   ├── Row: Avatar (circular, 40px) + VStack(greeting "HELLO! ADOM", "20 DAYS STREAK" com fire icon)
│   └── Notification bell icon
├── Weekly Calendar Strip (component ref)
├── Nutrition Section
│   ├── Row: Calorie Ring (circular progress 375/1450) + VStack("Fuel Score", "87/100")
│   └── Row: Macro badges (Protein 100g, Carbs 34g, Fat 54g)
├── Workout Section
│   ├── "YOUR WORKOUT" header
│   ├── Pro tip text
│   └── Exercise list (3 rows com imagens AI-generated)
└── Tab Bar (ref: xcybV)
```

### Tela 2: Workout Tab (390x844)
**Estrutura:**
```
Workout Tab (V2)
├── Header
│   ├── Row: Avatar + "ADOM SHAFI" + notification icon
├── Weekly Calendar Strip
├── Ongoing Workout Section
│   ├── Row: "Ongoing Workout" badge (green) + "START WORKOUT" button (dark green)
│   ├── Timer "10MIN 30SEC" (bold, large)
│   └── "Chest, Quadriceps, Hamstrings" subtitle
├── Custom Workout Row (icon + "Custom Workout" + arrow)
├── Today's Workout Section
│   ├── "TODAY'S WORKOUT" header
│   ├── Pro tip text
│   └── Exercise list (3 rows com imagens)
└── Tab Bar (ref: xcybV)
```

### Tela 3: Workout Detail (390x844)
**Estrutura:**
```
Workout Detail (V2)
├── Header: Back arrow + "Workout" + notification icon
├── Title Section
│   ├── "GET ACTIVE AGAIN" (bold, large)
│   ├── "Chest, Core, Biceps" subtitle
│   └── Row: Level badge "Beginner" + Time badge "60 Min"
├── Hero Image (frame com AI image - pessoa com mat de exercício)
├── Equipment Section
│   ├── "Equipment's Needed" header
│   └── Row: Equipment chips (Exercise Mat, Dumbbells, Treadmill)
├── Exercises Section
│   ├── Row: "Exercises (3)" header + "Add Exercise" button
│   └── Exercise list (3 rows com imagens + checkboxes)
└── "START WORKOUT" button (purple gradient, full width)
```

### Tela 4: AI Assistant "FitPal" (390x844)
**Estrutura:**
```
AI Assistant (FitPal)
├── Header: Back arrow
├── Center Content (flex grow, centered)
│   ├── Purple Orb (ellipse com gradient mesh roxo/magenta)
│   ├── "FitPal" label
│   ├── "HEY ADOM!" (bold, large)
│   └── "How can I help you?" subtitle
├── Quick Actions Row (wrap)
│   ├── "Meal Plan" chip (icon + text)
│   ├── "Workouts" chip (icon + text)
│   └── "Ask me Fitness Questions" chip (icon + text)
└── Input Field: text input + icons (attachment + microphone)
```

### Tela 5: Profile (390x844)
**Estrutura:**
```
Profile
├── Header: "PREMIUM MEMBER" badge + settings gear icon
├── Profile Section (centered)
│   ├── Avatar (circular, large, ~100px, com AI image)
│   └── "ADOM SHAFI" name
├── Stats Row
│   ├── Stat: "12" Active Streak
│   ├── Stat: "1H 20M" Workout Minutes
│   └── Stat: "28" Completed Workout
├── Whoop Sync Banner (green rounded pill)
├── Sections List
│   ├── "MY BODY" row + subtitle + arrow
│   ├── "WORKOUT" row + subtitle + arrow
│   └── "MEAL PLANS" row + subtitle + arrow
└── Tab Bar (ref: xcybV)
```

---

## Ordem de execução

1. **Criar placeholders** - 5 frames vazios com `placeholder: true` posicionados em espaço livre
2. **Criar componentes reutilizáveis** - Weekly Calendar, Exercise Row with Image, etc.
3. **Montar Tela 1 (Home)** - Seção por seção, gerar imagens de exercícios com `G()`
4. **Montar Tela 2 (Workout Tab)** - Reutilizar componentes da Home
5. **Montar Tela 3 (Workout Detail)** - Hero image + equipment + exercise list
6. **Montar Tela 4 (AI Assistant)** - Purple orb + quick actions
7. **Montar Tela 5 (Profile)** - Stats + sections
8. **Verificar cada tela** - `get_screenshot()` após completar cada uma
9. **Remover placeholders** - Limpar flags `placeholder: true`

---

## Design System a manter

- **Background**: `#FFFFFF` (white)
- **Cards/Surfaces**: `#F4F4F5` (light gray)
- **Primary CTA**: `#8B5CF6` (purple)
- **Text primary**: `#18181B`
- **Text secondary**: `#71717A` / `#A1A1AA`
- **Borders**: `#E4E4E7` / `#D4D4D8`
- **Typography**: Plus Jakarta Sans (headings), Inter (body)
- **Corner radius**: 24px (cards), 100px (circular), 20px (chips)
- **Tab Bar**: ref `xcybV`
- **Green accent** (novo, para workout): `#1B4332` (dark green do reference)

---

## Verificação

Após completar cada tela:
1. `get_screenshot(nodeId)` para verificar visualmente
2. Comparar com as screenshots de referência
3. Corrigir alinhamento, espaçamento ou cores conforme necessário
4. `snapshot_layout()` para verificar estrutura se necessário


If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/viniciuscarvalho/.REDACTED.jsonl

If this plan can be broken down into multiple independent tasks, consider using the TeamCreate tool to create a team and parallelize the work.

content.text:
All done! Here's a summary of what was created:

**7 new reusable components** added to the Components frame:
- **Weekly Calendar Strip** (`ddwZZ`) - 7-day row with active day highlight
- **Exercise Row Image** (`xz1xv`) - Row with circular thumbnail, name, detail, arrow
- **Calorie Ring** (`L3G9Z`) - Circular progress with center text
- **Macro Badge** (`MNCgA`) - Value + label card for macros
- **Stat Card** (`UQKxO`) - Value + label for profile stats
- **Section Row** (`uIQSX`) - Title + subtitle + chevron for navigation
- **Quick Action Chip** (`Xi7fm`) - Bordered pill with icon + text

**5 new screens** created:

1. **Home Screen V2** - Avatar header with streak, weekly calendar, calorie ring + fuel score, macro badges, exercise list with stock photos, tab bar
2. **Workout Tab V2** - Header, calendar, ongoing workout banner (green), timer display, custom workout row, today's exercise list with images, tab bar
3. **Workout Detail V2** - Back nav, bold title, level/time badges, hero AI image, equipment chips, exercise list with checkboxes, purple gradient CTA button
4. **AI Assistant FitPal** - Centered purple mesh-gradient orb, greeting text, 3 quick action chips, input field with mic button
5. **Profile** - Premium gradient badge, large avatar, stats row with separators, Whoop sync banner, 4 section rows, tab bar
